name: Maze Rush: Monster Edition
description:
Right Mouse Button - Move Right

Left Mouse Button-Move Left

Space-Jump

Avoid the observers, and get to the black tile with the "E" to escape.

Made for Mini Jam 6, Theme: Boss Rush, Limitations: No WASD or Arrow Movement.

This is my first game jam entry, and second game so, there probably will be bugs.  :D

Thanks for playing
